}}'''Quinton Hoover''' ([[16 March]] [[1964]] â€“ [[20 April]] [[2013]]) was an American fantasy artist most known for his work for [[Magic: The Gathering]]. In the 1990s, he was commissioned by [[Iron Crown Enterprises]] to make card art for the ''[[Middle-earth Collectible Card Game]]''.
